item.description:
This is a Free Friday Flick at the library. It is a thought-provoking and multi-award winning film. We'll watch the film and then walk down to a local place for drinks afterward.

Tagline: You think you know who you are. You have no idea.

Synopsis:

A Brentwood housewife and her D.A. husband. A Persian store owner. Two police detectives who are also lovers. An African-American television director and his wife. A Mexican locksmith. Two car-jackers. A rookie cop. A middle-aged Korean couple. They all live in Los Angeles. And during the next 36 hours, they will all collide.

Genres: Drama
Running Time: 1 hr. 47 min.
Release Date: May 6th, 2005 (wide)
MPAA Rating: R for language, sexual content and some violence

Starring: Sandra Bullock, Don Cheadle, Matt Dillon, Jennifer Esposito, William Fichtner
Directed by: Paul Haggis

Watch the movie trailer

Read the IMDb entry
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet by the couch in the gallery before (or after if you miss us)
item.name: NPL Film: Crash (2005)
